name: Admin Select Box To Select2
author: Aftab Muni

sections.description: This plugin is used to convert all simple select boxes to select2. Checkout out demo here Select2 Example
sections.installation:
To install this plugin follow below steps

  1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s it, no other settings needed.
sections.faq:
When this plugin is useful?

This plugin is useful when you need to convert simple select box to select2 so that you can search and select the item.

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.
